trs: A husband and wife, who went to a family \textit{tahlilan} event in Cirebon, \textbf{were attacked} \textbf{by a motorcycle gang}.’\footnote{\textit{Tahlilan} is a Muslim social gathering to commemorate the dead. \textit{Pak} is a short form of \textit{bapak}, a kin term used to address or refer to one’s father and adult males in general.}  (\citetitle{FokusPagi}, \textit{Indosiar}, 9/11/2015)
